meanings.definition: A soldier assigned to an officer as a servant
meanings.sent1: The batman helped the officer with his uniform.
meanings.sent2: The army officer's batman was always by his side.
meanings.sent3: The batman accidentally polished the officer's boots too much!
meanings.sent4: The batman was like a shadow, always ready to assist.
meanings.sent5: The batman's loyalty to the officer was unwavering.

meanings.definition: A superhero character from DC Comics
meanings.sent1: My favorite comic book hero is Batman.
meanings.sent2: Batman is known for fighting crime in Gotham City.
meanings.sent3: I dressed up as Batman for Halloween last year.
meanings.sent4: The Batman symbol in the sky signaled trouble was near.
meanings.sent5: Batman's cape billowed behind him as he raced through the night.

meanings.definition: A large flying mammal with leathery wings
meanings.sent1: The batman soared through the night sky in search of food.
meanings.sent2: A batman can navigate in the dark using echolocation.
meanings.sent3: The batman's wingspan was impressive as it flew overhead.
meanings.sent4: The batman's silhouette against the moon was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The batman's flight was graceful and silent.

meanings.definition: A person who dresses up as a bat for entertainment or Halloween
meanings.sent1: The children loved the friendly batman at the Halloween party.
meanings.sent2: The batman costume was a hit at the costume contest.
meanings.sent3: The batman entertained the crowd with his funny bat dance.
meanings.sent4: The batman's mask added an air of mystery to his costume.
meanings.sent5: The batman's wings were made of soft fabric for comfort.
